description: Display current model, directory, and git branch with change indicators in the status line. Shows model name, folder name, active branch, and count of uncommitted changes for complete development context.

statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(cat); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir"); BRANCH=""; if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then BRANCH=" | üåø $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)"; CHANGES=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l); if [ $CHANGES -gt 0 ]; then BRANCH="$BRANCH ($CHANGES)"; fi; fi; echo "[$MODEL] üìÅ ${DIR##*/}$BRANCH"'
